title.value: Statistical processing of results of filtration researches

journal.title: Land Reclamation : scientific and practical journal

person.name: Borovikov, A.A., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was realized a research into studying the filtration properties of sansy sapropel mixtures with the aim to evaluate the influence of sapropel content on water penetration capacity and filtration reliability of obtained mixture for the regulation of the obtained indexes. For determination of the most authentic coefficient of a filtering the statistical analysis of test data has been carried out. Subordination of results of filtration studies to the law of normal allocation allows to observe arithmetic-mean values of coefficients of a filtering as the most probable.
